text: Male honeybees have only a mother (born from unfertilized eggs), while females have both parents. Count ancestors at each generation and you get the Fibonacci sequence: 1, 1, 2, 3, 5, 8...
Chebyshev's name has been transliterated so many ways (Chebyshev, Chebychev, Tchebycheff, Tschebyscheff...) that his polynomials are denoted T_n(x) based on one of the older spellings.
